document_data.mainbody:
Hulfast was a slaver inhabiting the city of Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Hulfast worked with Lhund Dhaermos out of the Dhaermos Warehouse located on Belnimbras Street in Waterdeeps Dock Ward. He acquired slaves and exotic flora and fauna that Lhund sold through the warehouse.
